item.title: Watermelon!
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:19, topic:346724”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=443103.msg3254290#msg3254290 date=1278003838]


Hmmmmm the possibility’s are endless.

Throw in some grape kool-aid and it will be a niggasm.

Its grape DRINK l2blackpeople

It’s purple drank!! l2talkblack

Fuck you dude, I was eating water melon!! I THREW THE PLATE!!! UGH!

Watermelon with a plate?

Thats what I was wondering no one eats it on a plate.

How is that? I cut water melon, then put in a plate then eat it… -.-?

Hold it in my hands:D
[/quote]

I understand where he is coming from, cut it off of the rine, into small peices, and you can also eat it with a fork. Im with krackkid though, “Sho’ is good” eating it with my hands.[/quote]
Hell ya, hands are good for many things.

Read full topic
